attributes.action: Make music a compulsory part of the national curriculum for members of upper schools years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Music is the foundation on which many of earth's civilisations have been built. It is no longer given enough recognition in school life and pupils taking their GSCEs and A levels are turning away from the subject more and more. Pupils need to know the importance of the ever-present element of our society that is music, and all of it's different forms.
